findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Usage of SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead, increasing gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables not defined as `immutable` can increase storage and computation requirements.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make the contract more difficult to understand and maintain, increasing deployment and interaction costs.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Missing proper checks for zero values in variable setters can lead to problems during contract execution.
